contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=July 2013}} {{Underlinked|date=July 2013}} '''Aoyama Yōichi''' (青山 陽一) is a male [[J-Pop|Japanese popular music]] artist who started his career as a member of [[GRANDFATHERS]]. ==Discography== ===Singles=== * 'Saigo ha Nudo' (23 December 1998) * 'STARLAB' (19 January 2000) * 'Nanpasen no Seira' (25 April 2001) * 'Come and Go' (26 June 2002) ===Albums=== * ''SINGS WITH THE BLUE MOUNTAINS'' (20 May 1990) * ''Home Fever'' (6 June 1993) * ''one or six'' (10 October 1995) * ''Ah'' (15 November 1997) * ''SONGS TO REMEMBER'' (24 February 1999) * ''SO FAR SO CLOSE'' (21 January 1999) * ''EQ'' (23 February 2000) * ''Bugcity'' (6 June 2001) * ''Jaw'' (7 August 2002) * ''ODREL'' (26 May 2004) ==External links== * [http://www.ex-inc.net/aoyama/index.php yōichi aoyama official website] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> |name= Aoyama, Yoichi |alternative names= |short description= |date of birth= |place of birth= |date of death= |place of death= | NAME= Aoyama, Yoichi }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Aoyama, Yoichi}} [[Category:Japanese pop singers]] [[Category:Living people]]
